All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Re-initializes the transient JavaFX components (Image and ImageView) after deserialization.
Deck
 
EISCUnoEnum
Enum EISCUnoEnum This enum represents the various file paths for the images used in the EISC Uno game.
GameUno
The GameUno class implements the core logic for a UNO card game session, managing the state and interactions between a human player, a machine player, the deck of cards, and the table.
GameUnoController
Controller class for the Uno game.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
IGameUno
Interface representing the Uno game functionality.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
Main
The main class of the EISC Uno application.
Player
Represents a player in the Uno game.
Table
Represents the table in a game of EISCUno, where cards are played.
ThreadPlayMachine
 
ThreadSingUNOMachine
ThreadSingUNOMachine is a thread that checks if the human player has only one card left.
